definitions.body: :Da 8:1 vision (on format. cf. Lg:BN 204)—abs. ´[[ח]] Ho 12:11 + 25 t.; cstr. [[חֲזוֹן]] Is 1:1 + 8 t.

vision, as seen in the ecstatic state ‖[[קסם]] Mic 3:6; ‖[[מקסם]] Ez Eze 12:24; ‖[[חלמות]] Da 1:17; ‖[[נביא]] Da 9:24; ´[[חזה ח]] Ez Eze 12:27, Eze 13:16; ´[[ראה ח]] Da 8:15; ´[[ראה בח]] Da 8:2, Da 8:2, Da 9:21; ´[[דבּר בח]] Ps 89:20; [[חזון]] [[נראה אל]] Da 8:1 vision appeared unto; ´[[מחא ח]] [[מיהוה]] La 2:9 find a vision from Yahweh; also Ez Eze 12:22, Eze 12:23, Da 8:13, Da 8:17, Da 8:26, Da 10:14, Da 11:14.
vision, in the night [[חֲזוֹן לַיְלָה]] Is 29:7.

divine communication in a vision, oracle, prophecy ´[[בקשׁ ח]] [[מנביא]] seek a vision (prophecy) from prophet Ez Eze 7:26; ‖([[ים]])[[דבר ]] 1Sa 3:1, 1Ch 17:15; [[חֲווֹן לִבָּס יְדַבֵָּרוּ]] Je 23:16 a prophecy of their own hearts (minds) they speak; [[חֲזוֹן שֶׁקֶר וְקֶסֶם אֱלִיל וְתַרְמִית לִבָּם]] [[הֵמָּה מִתְנַבְּאִים]] Je 14:14 false vision and (v. [[אֱלִיל]]) worthless divination & deceit of their own hearts they are prophesying; ´[[כתב ח]] write the vision Hb Hab 2:2; also Ho 12:11, Hb Hab 2:3, Pr 29:18, Ez Eze 7:13 (del. Co).
vision, as title of book of prophecy, [[ספר חזון נחוּם]] Na 1:1; [[ישׁעיהו]] ´[[ח]] Is 1:1; [[עבדיה]] ´[[ח]] Ob:Ob 1; of other writings of prophets 2Ch 32:32.
